name: BelousovZhabotinsky (dysts)
equations: BelousovZhabotinsky system (see dysts package for equations)
description_simple: A reduced-order model of the BZ reaction that exhibits period doubling. The bifurcation parameter for controlling the onset of chaos is kf. The system undergoes regular cycling when kf=3e-4, and chaotic oscillations when kf=3.5e-4
description_complex: A chaotic dynamical system imported from the dysts package. This system exhibits complex, sensitive dynamics characteristic of deterministic chaos.
